author: gbrown
msg: Restore definition of Shape bounds to be relative to the shape's origin, not the parent's origin.

author: lhazlewood
msg: SHIRO-25: added execute(Callable) and execute(Runnable) methods to associate single-call-only 'runAs' support.  Also refactored the Spring SecureRemoteInvocationExecutor to use this more convenient approach, rather than having to manage a ThreadState object manually.

author: eevans
msg: refactor sample code as contrib module
